name: refrigeration machine production, carbon dioxide, liquid as refrigerant | refrigeration machine, carbon dioxide, liquid as refrigerant | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/12758/documentation

This dataset represents production of refrigeration machine which is later on build into reefer (refrigerated container).;Refrigeration machine, Star Cool (Source: Maersk Container Industry, 2014, http://www.mcicontainers.com/products/reefermachines/pages/starcoolpictureframeunit.aspx, accessed 20141022).;This refrigeration machine is an electric powered integrated cooling and heating system operating on refrigerant R134a. The system is designed to maintain cargo temperatures in a range from -30°C to +30°C. The system is designed to operate in ambient temperatures from -30°C to +50°C.

The activity starts when all the individual parts are brought to the assembly hall for assembling. 

The activity ends when the refrigeration machine is ready to be inserted into the reefer (refrigerated container).
category: C:Manufacturing/29:Manufacture of motor vehicles, trailers and semi-trailers/292:Manufacture of bodies (coachwork) for motor vehicles; manufacture of trailers and semi-trailers/2920:Manufacture of bodies (coachwork) for motor vehicles; manufacture of traile

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The dataset is primarily build based on information on Star Cool refrigeration machine model SCI-40. ;The system consists of following modules; condenser (compressor module), evaporator module and evaporator fan module. The cooling system is also equiped with a two-stage compressor, electrically driven through a frequency converter. ;;The cooling system is also equipped with an economizer, which performs the task of sub-cooling the liquid from the receiver to the evaporator, thereby increasing the cooling capacity of the cooling system. ;;The evaporators are controlled by electronically expansion valves. The equipment is designed to operate on a nominal 410 V AC / 450 V AC, 3 phase, 50/60 Hz, primary power source, according to ISO 1496-2. An integrated dual wound transformer supplies control circuit voltage. An automatic system, power supply sensing and correction, is provided to ensure the correct direction of rotation for the fan motors. This is done regardless of the incoming phase sequence from the primary power supply, provided that all fan motors are wired correctly. ;The most used refrigerant in these refrigeration machines is the R134a. Since this refrigerant has a high global warming potential the refrigeration technology producers started producing referigeration machines with alternative refrigerants (Carrier, 2014, http://dms.hvacpartners.com//docs/2000/Public/0D/62-11665.pdf, accessed 20141105). One of them is liquid carbon dioxide.;Further references: ;- Restrepo, G., 2007, Ranking of refrigerants, Environmental Science and Technology;- Bovea, M.D., 2007, Comparative Life Cycle Assessment of Commonly Used Refrigerants in Commercial Refrigeration Systems

exchanges.description:
Calculated value. 

The weight od the air compressor present in the database is 140kg. The weight of the compressor needed for the refrigeration unit is 58kg. The amount of the exchange needed is scaled accordingly.

The original Star Cool refrigeration machine the compressor's description:

Make; Bitzer 
Type: Semi – hermetic two-stage reciprocating. 
Number of cylinders: 2 Low stages cylinders, 2 High stage cylinders. 
Speed: Variable in interval from 20 Hz – 110 Hz controlled by the frequency converter. 
Model: S4BCF – 5.2Y 
Nominal power: 5.5 kW 
Compressor oil type: Reniso Triton SEZ 55 or equivalent 
Compressor housing: Seawater resistant aluminium, unpainted. 
Displacement: 42 m3/h @ 110 Hz 
Weight: 58 Kg

exchanges.description:
Calculated based on assumptions.

Copper is used in the refrigerated machine as a part of evaporator coil module and condenser coil module. The tubes are made of copper.

6*2=12 is the number of copper coils present in the evaporator coil module.
0.253 kg is the weight of 1m of copper coil with diameter of 10mm and wall thickness of 1mm (http://www.copper-tubes.net/soft.html, accessed 20141022).
4 is the number of rows of copper coils present in the condenser coil module
0.1685 kg is the weight of 1m of copper coil with diameter of 7mm and wall thickness of 1mm (calculated based on http://www.copper-tubes.net/soft.html, accessed 20141022).

Calculated value.

16.7 kg/m is the weight of HE 100A I beam (height 96mm)

- receiver of capacity 6.2l is made from stainelss steel (proxy used: steel, low-alloyed, hot rolled).
- economiser 
- evaporator fan motor
- condenser fan motor
- evaporator coil heaters
